snippet.title: Cursed Silence - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist "Cursed Silence: Chapter 1" in Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2603000/Cursed_Silence/

"Cursed Silence" beckons you into a realm of psychological horror and investigation, where fear lurks in every corner. 🔦🌑

Journey with a protagonist whose grip on reality falters, plagued by inner demons and the haunting loss of a loved one. In this 42-second teaser trailer, catch a fleeting glimpse of the shadows that ensnare them, offering just a taste of the impending dread.

🎮 Play the Demo in 4 Months! 🎮

Venture into atmospheric environments where the boundary between truth and nightmare blurs, as you grapple with your own sanity.

Follow our progress:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/snowhorsegames
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/snowhorsegames
- Twitter X: https://twitter.com/snowhorsegames
- Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@snowhorsegames
- Itch.io: https://snowhorse-entertainment.itch.io/

[Disclaimer: "Cursed Silence" is a work of fiction and intended for entertainment purposes only.]
